00033 CalvinException::CalvinException()
00034 {
00035         errorCode = 0;
00036         lineNumber = 0;
00037         fileName = "";
00038         timeStamp = DateTime::GetCurrentDateTime().ToString();
00039         errorDescription = L"";
00040         sourceName = L"";                       
00041 }

00071 CalvinException::CalvinException(std::wstring _Source, std::wstring _Description, u_int64_t _ErrorCode)
00072 {
00073         Source(_Source);
00074         Description(_Description);
00075         LineNumber(0);
00076         SourceFile("");
00077         TimeStamp(DateTime::GetCurrentDateTime().ToString());
00078         ErrorCode(_ErrorCode);
00079 }
